text: The Pacific Games (formerly known as the South Pacific Games) is a continental multi-sport event competing Olympic sports. Only countries around the Pacific Ocean are allowed to play at these games. It is held every four years and began in 1963. ==Other websites== * List of South Pacific Games and Mini Games on www.rsssf.com by Rec.Sport.Soccer Statistics Foundation Category:1960s establishments in Oceania Category:1963 establishments Category:Multi-sport events
title: Pacific Games
